name: Khazzad Dum
overview: In the vast forests of Brethil, inhabited the community of elves. They had lived in the fortress of Khazzad-Dum for centuries, but in their wars with the Dark Lord, they lost all their possessions and were banished. The time has come to recover the fortress and for this you will have to destroy the beasts of Banglir. The beasts guard a part of the five that make up the Magic Center of Mithrandir, an essential center to destroy Banglir and be able to undo the Dark Power.
